hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hammer Room Clear Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Zora Tunic#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly GS Near Boss

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Bongo Bongo# holds...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Deku Shield#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Bolero of Fire#.

GC (Medigoron).text: Ganondorf doesn't specialize in hiding items, nor in keeping secrets for that matter.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the real Phantom Ganon is bright and loud.

HC (Malon).text: Did you know that you only need to play the Song of Time to open the Door of Time? The Spiritual Stones are not needed.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Prescription#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Zelda's Lullaby#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Prescription#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Zelda's Lullaby#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Forest Temple Compass# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #1# major item.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
